verbose_text: Moreover, in Mexican Americans, diagnosis based on the OGTT provided a better tool than HbA 1c to identify subjects with beta-cell impairment, implying that the glucose load allows more accurate identification of subtle impairment in beta-cell functions compared with fasting plasma glucose or HbA 1c.
evidence: glucose load allows more accurate identification of subtle impairment in beta-cell functions compared with fasting plasma glucose or HbA
